trans-unit.source: A standard endpoint with a fixed <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding"></xref> binding that automatically adds the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior"></xref> behavior.
Use this endpoint when writing a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] REST service.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpEndpoint"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription"></xref> and <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether automatic format selection is enabled.

When automatic format selection is enabled, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure parses the `Accept` header of the request message and determines the most appropriate response format.

If the `Accept` header does not specify a suitable response format, the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure uses the `Content-Type` of the request message or the default response format of the operation.
`true` if automatic format selection is enabled, otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets the default outgoing response format.
The default response format for the endpoint.
Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
Returns `true` if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns `false`.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the HTTP help page is enabled for the endpoint.
`true` if the HTTP help page is enabled; otherwise `false`.
Gets the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the endpoint.
